help.paragraph1: Here is your provisional score, it changes with each new answer!
help.paragraph2: Browse reference models to understand your website's ecological impact on the planet.

actForThePlanet.subtitle: Act for the planet
actForThePlanet.title: How to act?
actForThePlanet.text: Discover personalized actions to act today for the planet.

ecologicalImpact.subtitle: The ecological impact
ecologicalImpact.title: What is the climate footprint?
ecologicalImpact.text: The concentration of carbon in the atmosphere is increasing so much so that the planet's climate is undergoing upheavals with serious consequences: rising water levels, destruction of life, explosion of climatic disasters.

averageTime.title: What is the average time spent on the journey per user?

home.title: Do you know the ecological impact of your website on the planet?
home.text: In 10 minutes obtain an estimate of your ecological impact at the end of the test!

mobileVisitors.title: What is the proportion of mobile users?

notFound.title: The page is not found or it is under construction but don't give up :)

pagesViewed.title: What is the number of pages viewed?

referenceModels.title: Reference models
referenceModels.text: The life cycle calculator assesses the ecological impact of a user's journey over a year, based on website traffic, energy intensity, carbon intensity of electricity, energy source used.

serversLocated.title: Where are most of the servers located?

visitorsLocated.title: Where are the majority of users located?

visitorsPerMonth.title: What is the number of visitors per month?
visitorsPerMonth.text: The number of visitors per month allows you to know the quantity of user terminals, network equipment, servers necessary to consult the content or services that you deliver. If you do not know it, you can find this information in your Google Analytics tool or equivalent.

website.title: What do we measure the impact of?
website.text: Eco-design always starts from a clearly identified user need for which the digital service seeks to provide a solution.
